hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said (to me), "You were shown to me in a dream. An angel brought you to me, wrapped in a piece of silken cloth, and said to me, 'This is your wife.' I removed the piece of cloth from your face, and there you were. I said to myself. 'If it is from Allah, then it will surely be

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّظَرِ إِلَى الْمَرْأَةِ قَبْلَ التَّزْوِيجِ
chapter.eng-name: (It is permissible) to look at a woman before marrying.
